name: CYPHER
description: The core of encryption, where messages transform through shared keys

name: KEYPAIR
description: Twin stars of public and private keys, bound in mathematical harmony

name: DIGEST
description: The one-way star, where data flows in but never returns the same

name: SIGNAL
description: The messenger star, guardian of secure communications

name: HIDDEN
description: The invisible star, master of steganography and hidden messages

name: SALT
description: The seasoning star, adding unique flavor to every password

name: CHAIN
description: The binding star, where blocks of data form unbreakable chains

name: MASK
description: The veiling star, master of code obfuscation

name: VAULT
description: The guardian star, protector of secure storage

name: SHIELD
description: The defensive star, warding off network threats
